amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part D of House Report 117-366 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 3, 6, 7.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 comprised of amendments numbered 1, 3, 6, and 7, printed in Part D of House Report 117-366.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 276 - 147, 1 Present (Roll no. 262).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
